config.cliPath.description:
**Path to Quarkdown CLI executable**

**Windows Users:** You may need to specify the full path to `quarkdown.bat`

**Examples:**
- Default: `quarkdown`
- Windows: `C:\\path\\to\\quarkdown.bat`
- Linux/Mac: `/usr/local/bin/quarkdown`

**Common Windows Paths:**
- `C:\\Users\\[username]\\Project\\quarkdown\\bin\\quarkdown.bat`
- `quarkdown.bat` (if in PATH)

**To find your path on Windows:**
- Run `where quarkdown.bat` in PowerShell
- Or run `Get-Command quarkdown | Select-Object Source`
config.previewTheme.darko: Dark theme - Dark background with vibrant syntax highlighting
config.previewTheme.academic: Academic theme - Optimized for research papers and formal documents
config.enableMath.description:
Enable MathJax for mathematical expressions rendering

Supports LaTeX syntax: `$inline$` and `$$display$$`
config.enableAutoPreview.description:
Automatically update preview when document changes

When enabled, the preview will refresh in real-time as you edit
config.showWelcomeMessage.description: Show welcome message and setup guidance on first use
